Class EntityRefListProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.worldmodel.AbstractProperty
      • rescuecore2.worldmodel.properties.EntityRefListProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Property

    public class EntityRefListProperty
extends AbstractProperty
    A property that refers to a list of entity IDs.
